quote: This ride was a great distance, easy to follow a nice mix of trails and roads. The bonus was beautiful scenery!!! Would definitely recommend!

This gravel ride is perfect for someone new to gravel riding with three loop options, all of which are relatively flat. Although gravel is less common in eastern Marathon County (roughly half of the route is gravel) the more abundant lakes add a scenic value.

Dirt, rocks, steep climbs, sun, and breathtaking views! [...] We began our ride in the charming village of Borgo Parrini, which has been transformed in recent years by local artists into a vibrant canvas of colorful murals, mosaics, and Sicilian folk art.
Since the route is unmarked, download the cue sheets and GPX files.
